item.title: What is Vekllei?
item.description: What is Vekllei? Hi, I’m Hobart and I write and draw Vekllei at Studio MillMint. This is a pretty complex project. Not just complex insofar as there’s a lot to read about it, but that it uses concepts and terminology you might not be familiar with if this is your first time around utopian fiction. So Vekllei is a utopia — what does this mean? It’s latin for “no place,” and I use that literally.
